lead_paragraph: An unusually wide townhouse with a neo-Georgian-style facade enters the market for the first time in two decades.

headline.main: Upper West Side Townhouse With Neo-Georgian Details

snippet: An unusually wide townhouse with a neo-Georgian-style facade enters the market for the first time in two decades.
abstract: Upper West Side historic townhouse, unusually wide at 25 feet and boasting neo-Georgian facade with balconies and gargoyles, enters the market for the first time in two decades at $11.9 million.
